name: Eric's Ultimate Solitaire
description: The classic solitaire card game suite Eric's Ultimate Solitaire from Delta Tao Software is now available for Linux! With Eric's Ultimate Solitaire, you can enjoy a myriad selection of traditional and not-so-traditional games of solitaire. Choose from 23 different games, track your successes and failures, hone your thinking and strategy skills. Best of all, this version of Eric's Ultimate Solitaire CD is made for Linux operating systems -- a sure favorite for Linux users and cardplayers everywhere.
